code: @Override protected boolean protocolConnect(String host, int port, String user, String password) throws MessagingException {     address = user + '@' + host.     return super.protocolConnect(host, port, user, password). }

@Override public Folder getFolder(String name) throws MessagingException {     if ("INBOX".equals(name)) {         return super.getFolder(name).     }     Folder folder = folders.get(name).     if (folder == null) {         // need a new mailbox as its a sub folder         String adr = name + "-" + address.         Mailbox mailbox = Mailbox.get(Aliases.getInstance().resolve(adr)).         folder = new MyMockFolder(this, mailbox, name).         folders.put(name, folder).     }     return folder. }
